name: es6-project-bp
description: A boilerplate for building and testing pure ES6 applications

scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha --require test/env.js --webpack-config test/webpack-config.test.js --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 10000 test/**/*_test.js --watch
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha --require test/env.js --webpack-config test/webpack-config.test.js --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 10000 test/**/*_test.js
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server --mode development --content-base src
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production && cp -r src/public/* dist/

author: James Abels
